## 二項分布  
```{r}
## xは0から10までとりうる
x <- seq(0,20,by=1)

## それぞれのxの値を取りうる確率  
p_x <- dbinom(x, size = 20, prob = 0.6)

## 作図  
data.frame(x = x,
           p_x = p_x) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = p_x))+
  geom_col()+
  theme_bw(base_size = 13)+
  theme(aspect.ratio = 1,
        axis.title.y = element_text(angle=0,
                                    vjust = 0.5,
                                    family = "Yu Mincho"),
        axis.text = element_text(family = "Times New Roman"))+
  labs(y = "x\n頭\nが\n休\n息\n集\n団\nに\nい\nる\n確\n率")+
  annotate(geom = "text",
           x = 2, y = 0.15,
           parse = T,
          label = str_c("italic(p) ==", 0.7),
          family = "Times New Roman",
          size = 6) -> p_binom

# ggsave("p_binom.png", p_binom, width =100, height = 100, dpi = 600, units = "mm")
```
